title: North Korea Predicted The Future? The Coming Vaping Wave 5.4.18
itunes:title: North Korea Predicted The Future? The Coming Vaping Wave 5.4.18
description:
In episode 141, Jack & Miles are joined by comedian Eric Lampaert to discuss Big Vape and tobacco companies, the current White House administration being a complete mess (Trump undercutting Giuliani, drama in the EPA and Department of Interior), the propaganda film in North Korea showing the meeting of the US and Kim Jong Un, a look at the Royal Wedding coming up, bloidwatch, & more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
